function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Development of robotic systems for remote access may lead to reduced human interaction, impacting mental health.","Impact":"Increased risk of loneliness, depression, and mental health issues due to reduced social interactions.","Mitigation":"Implement regular check-ins and support systems for individuals using remote robotic systems. Encourage and facilitate in-person interactions in addition to remote interactions.","Technologies":"Social robots, telepresence systems, virtual reality environments for social interaction.","People":"Individuals in quarantine, the elderly, individuals with limited social support networks.","Owner":"Healthcare providers, technology developers, community support organizations."},{"Description":"Increased reliance on teleoperation and telecommuting may lead to decreased in-person social interactions.","Impact":"Reduced social interactions leading to potential negative effects on mental health, such as loneliness and isolation.","Mitigation":"Encourage and facilitate in-person social interactions. Implement mental health support programs for individuals who primarily engage in remote work and communication.","Technologies":"Teleoperation systems, telemedicine platforms, online communication tools.","People":"Remote workers, individuals engaged in telemedicine, students attending online courses.","Owner":"Employers, educational institutions, mental health support organizations."},{"Description":"Shift towards online gatherings and events may impact personal connections and community engagement.","Impact":"Reduced in-person gatherings and community events may lead to decreased social connections and sense of community belonging.","Mitigation":"Encourage hybrid events with both in-person and online components. Foster virtual community engagement through online platforms. Facilitate opportunities for in-person interactions.","Technologies":"Online event platforms, virtual reality conferencing, social media engagement tools.","People":"Event attendees, community members, organizations hosting events.","Owner":"Event organizers, community leaders, online platform developers."}]}
